sentences.en: Compulsory education comes under the same head as sanitation.
sentences.cn: 义务教育可以和卫生归入一类.
卫生条件差导致的疾病

sentences.en: Green residential environment, clean sanitation, there are 154 households.
sentences.cn: 小区绿化环境好, 干净卫生, 有154家住户.

sentences.en: International Advisor of Water Supply and Environmental Sanitation Program.
sentences.cn: 水与环境卫生项目国际顾问.

sentences.en: Make them know the basic requirements of breathing sanitation.
sentences.cn: 对学生开展呼吸卫生教育,让学生知道呼吸卫生的基本要求.

sentences.en: Many illnesses are the result of inadequate sanitation.
sentences.cn: 许多疾病都来源于不健全的卫生设施。

sentences.en: Monitor and maintain cleanliness, sanitation and organisation of assigned and service areas.
sentences.cn: 关注并保持所分配区域的卫生和物品组织情况.

sentences.en: Overcrowding and poor sanitation are common problems in prisons.
sentences.cn: 过度拥挤和卫生状况差是监狱里的普遍问题。

sentences.en: Preserve environmental sanitation, not to leave around and paste.
sentences.cn: 保持环境卫生, 不乱扔乱贴.

sentences.en: Providing the services of commodity quality inspection and sanitation inspection.
sentences.cn: 辽宁久久为您提供各类进出口货物的品质检验,检疫代理服务.

sentences.en: Serious violators may have their production and sanitation licenses revoked.
sentences.cn: 情节严重的将被吊销生产和卫生执照.

sentences.en: The city had administrative departments for finance, harbours, public buildings, sanitation and water supply.
sentences.cn: 京城有自己的管理部门负责财政 、 港口 、 公共建筑 、 卫生和供水等问题.

sentences.en: The impact of a number of plant diseases can also be lessened by sanitation.
sentences.cn: 许多植物病害的冲击也能靠环境卫生而减轻.

sentences.en: The location is exceptionally poor, viewed from the sanitation point.
sentences.cn: 从卫生角度来看,这个地段非常糟糕.

sentences.en: They lived in conditions of appalling sanitation.
sentences.cn: 他们生活在极为恶劣的卫生环境中.

sentences.en: Typhoid fever sneaks in when sanitation fails.
sentences.cn: 环境卫生搞不好,伤寒就会乘虚而入.

words.tran_cn: 使合卫生；装设卫生设备
采取卫生措施使其安全；给…消毒（等于sanitize）
使…无害；给…消毒；对…采取卫生措施
[医]环境卫生；卫生设备；下水道设施

trans.tran_en: the protection of public health by removing and treating waste, dirty water etc
